articles.author: Aristos Georgiou
articles.title: First American Dies From New Coronavirus in China
articles.description: "We offer our sincerest condolences to the family on their loss," a spokesperson for U.S. embassy in Beijing said.
articles.content: An American citizen has died of the novel coronavirus in the latest outbreak, according to officials. The U.S. embassy in Beijing announced that an unidentified 60-year-old American citizen passed away in Wuhan, Hubei province Chinawhere the outbreak beganon … [+1972 chars]
